snippet.title: Monitor
snippet.description: Julianne Moore, Josie Bissett, Felicity Huffman and more...

snippet.title: Robert Urich
snippet.description: From 'Vega$' to 'Spenser', Urich brought a workingman's ethic to a wide variety of television roles.

snippet.title: Lazarus Man
snippet.description: Robert Urich dies of cancer at 55. Plus, news about 'N Sync, Ben Stiller, Dave Matthews, Ashton Kutcher, Harold Ramis, Michael Caine, Forest Whitaker, and others
